content: यज्वन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यज्वरी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [यज्-क्वनिप्] Sacrificing, worshipping, adoring &c. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} One who performs sacrifices in accordance with Vedic precepts, a performer of sacrifices; नीपान्वयः पार्थिव एष यज्वा <ls>R. 6. 46</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 4</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 39</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 12</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 46.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
